welcome_message_body: Welcome to Southend, the charming seaside town known for its iconic pier, beautiful beaches, and vibrant atmosphere. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that this wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: La Petite Petanque
restaurants.description: La Petite Petanque is a french restaurant located in Southend-on-Sea.
restaurants.address: The Bowling Green Pavilion (Cambridge Square Gardens), Southend-on-Sea, Essex, SS1 1EZ

restaurants.name: Pulp Kitchen
restaurants.description: Pulp Kitchen is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Essex.

restaurants.name: Oldhams
restaurants.description: Oldhams is a fish and chips shop located in Essex.

restaurants.name: wagamama
restaurants.description: wagamama is a asian restaurant located in Essex.

restaurants.name: The Beach Hut
restaurants.description: The Beach Hut is a seafood restaurant located in Westcliff.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport serves primarily low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport is a modern and efficient facility, offering a range of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wethersfield Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
